clues.text: This "Big Bad" swing band performed for sports fans at the 1999 Super Bowl

rounds.comments: (Alex: These are books that have been summarized by the noted author who is now the editor of "News from the Republic of Letters.")

rounds.text: In 2013 this musical based on a movie became the first show to gross $1 billion on Broadway
